charaepi_ch0098_00_hau/2301_1101_0100_20:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] spotted Hau walking
into the mountains.
charaepi_ch0098_00_hau/2301_1101_0200_20:
Concerned about Raichu’s cries, 
[EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] decided to follow Hau into the mountains.
charaepi_ch0098_00_hau/2301_1201_0300_10:
Wait, is that... It’s [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
Were you following me?
charaepi_ch0098_00_hau/2301_0401_0600_10:
I mean, it wasn’t like it was a secret,
so you should have called out to me.
charaepi_ch0098_00_hau/2301_0402_0800_10:
Aw, you don’t have to hide it!
I mean, it’s not really a secret that I’m here!
charaepi_ch0098_00_hau/2301_1201_0900_10: I actually came here to train.
charaepi_ch0098_00_hau/2301_1201_1000_10:
I don’t know quite how it happened,
but somehow I ended up here on Pasio.
charaepi_ch0098_00_hau/2301_1201_1100_10:
As long as I’m here, though,
I want to get stronger.
charaepi_ch0098_00_hau/2301_0402_1500_10: There’s somebody I want to beat.
charaepi_ch0098_00_hau/2301_1201_1600_10:
My rival always comes at me and doesn’t hold
anything back. Kinda like you!
charaepi_ch0098_00_hau/2301_1201_1700_10:
But I’ve never won a match, so I can’t help 
but feel frustrated—and a little sad.
charaepi_ch0098_00_hau/2301_1201_1800_10:
That’s why I’m going to go meet 
a really strong Trainer up ahead!
charaepi_ch0098_00_hau/2301_1201_1900_10:
All right, let’s go, Raichu! I hear 
this Trainer is super strong, but I’m sure 
the two of us can handle it!
charaepi_ch0098_00_hau/2301_1201_2000_10: Huh? Are you not feeling up to this?
charaepi_ch0098_00_hau/2301_1201_2100_10:
Maybe our sync strength isn’t as high as I thought.
But we’ve surfed so much...
charaepi_ch0098_00_hau/2301_0302_2400_10: Maybe he’s not comfortable with it.
charaepi_ch0098_00_hau/2301_0402_2500_10:
Oh, I see!
You might be right, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
charaepi_ch0098_00_hau/2301_1201_2600_10: Sorry, Raichu. I forgot our promise today!
charaepi_ch0098_00_hau/2301_1201_2700_10:
We were supposed to go exploring the town
today, weren’t we? I’m so sorry, Raichu.
Come on—don’t be angry!
charaepi_ch0098_00_hau/2301_1201_2800_10: Hm? What is that smell? It smells really good.
charaepi_ch0098_00_hau/2301_1201_2900_10:
I must have accidentally touched
Raichu’s cheeks...
charaepi_ch0098_00_hau/2301_0401_3100_10: If you ever touch an Alolan Raichu’s cheeks...
charaepi_ch0098_00_hau/2301_0401_3200_10: the smell of pancakes comes wafting out.
charaepi_ch0098_00_hau/2301_0402_3400_10: If you ever touch an Alolan Raichu’s cheeks...
charaepi_ch0098_00_hau/2301_0402_3500_10: the smell of pancakes comes wafting out.
charaepi_ch0098_00_hau/2301_1201_3700_10:
In fact, nobody really knows why Raichu look the
way they do in Alola.
charaepi_ch0098_00_hau/2301_1201_3800_10:
There are people that say that it’s because
they ate too many pancakes, but I think it’s
the opposite.
charaepi_ch0098_00_hau/2301_0401_4000_10:
Pancakes in Alola make you hungry with just
their smell.
charaepi_ch0098_00_hau/2301_0402_4200_10:
Pancakes in Alola make you hungry with just
their smell.
charaepi_ch0098_00_hau/2301_1201_4300_10:
So I think Raichu learned to ride on their tails so
they could go find and eat pancakes more easily.
charaepi_ch0098_00_hau/2301_1201_4500_10:
I guess he’s just hungry.
He doesn’t care for theories right now.
charaepi_ch0098_00_hau/2301_1201_4600_10:
All right, forget training for today!
Let’s all go get some pancakes!
charaepi_ch0098_00_hau/2301_1201_4700_10:
Come with us, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
And once we’re done eating...
charaepi_ch0098_00_hau/2301_1201_4800_10: I’d like you to come train with us!
charaepi_ch0098_00_hau/2301_1201_4900_10:
I think you’re a lot stronger of 
an opponent than other Trainers!
